exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros Hlen Heq. assert (H: l1 ++ r1 = l2 ++ r2 -> l1 = l2 /\ r1 = r2). - intros Hconcat. destruct (app_inv_tail _ _ _ _ Hconcat) as [Hl1 Hr1]. split. + apply app_inv_head with r1. rewrite Hl1. apply app_inv_head with l1. apply Hr1. + apply app_inv_tail with l2. rewrite <- Heq. replace l2 with l1. apply Hconcat. symmetry. apply Hl1. - apply H. apply Heq.
